title: Weft Release
description: For cleaning the hair extension weft once it’s been removed from your client’s hair, reach for Weft Release. This adhesive remover works quickly to clear any leftover adhesive or residue that could affect new tape during a reinstall. Weft Release is designed to work well with little residue.
Oil base that’s safe for all wefts
Oil base that’s safe for all wefts
Quick to remove tape from wefts
Quick to remove tape from wefts
Quick to rinse with soap and water
Quick to rinse with soap and water
Low residue
Low residue
Refreshing summertime fragrance
Refreshing summertime fragrance
Unavailable in California
Unavailable in California
INGREDIENTS
Hydrocarbon Solvent, Fragrance
DIRECTIONS
Apply the solution over the area you wish to remove.
Apply the solution over the area you wish to remove.
Wait for one minute, then begin working the bond loose.
Wait for one minute, then begin working the bond loose.
Apply more solution if needed.
Apply more solution if needed.
When complete, rinse the area with soap and water to remove residue.
When complete, rinse the area with soap and water to remove residue.
CAUTIONS
Close cap tightly.
Close cap tightly.
Do not leave on silicone bases more than 2-3 minutes.
Do not leave on silicone bases more than 2-3 minutes.
Do not apply to broken, cut, or irritated skin.
Do not apply to broken, cut, or irritated skin.
Do not leave on skin for more than 30-45 minutes.
Do not leave on skin for more than 30-45 minutes.
Do not breathe fumes.
Do not breathe fumes.
External use only, do not ingest.
External use only, do not ingest.
Avoid eye contact.
Avoid eye contact.
Keep out of reach of children.
Keep out of reach of children.
Test on a small area before use.
Test on a small area before use.
Do not store or use near heat, sparks, or open flame.
Do not store or use near heat, sparks, or open flame.
Store at room temperature, below 90°F.
Store at room temperature, below 90°F.
